Package com.utbm.reversi.controller

Class RulesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.utbm.reversi.controller.RulesController
  • public class RulesController
extends java.lang.Object
    RulesController is the control class of the frame "rules" (MVC pattern).

    RulesController is defined by :

    • A "rules" view/frame (MVC pattern).

    See Also:
    RulesFrame

    • Constructor Detail

      • RulesController

        public RulesController​(RulesFrame rulesFrame)
        RulesController constructor.

        At the construction, the controller has to be link to a view/frame (MVC pattern).

        Parameters:
        rulesFrame - The frame linked to the controller.
        See Also:
        RulesFrame, RulesPanel
